name: dndvault
description: D&D Character Vault and Event Management for Discord.

scripts.test: npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest roll.test.js --testTimeout=5000 --runInBand && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest commands.test.js --testTimeout=5000 --runInBand && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest --testTimeout=5000 --runInBand --testPathIgnorePatterns roll.test.js --testPathIgnorePatterns commands.test.js
scripts.dockertest: docker build --target test . --rm --iidfile dndvaulttestdockerid && docker image rm `cat dndvaulttestdockerid` && rm dndvaulttestdockerid
scripts.preinstall: git lfs update --force && pre-commit install -t pre-commit -t pre-push
scripts.preinstall:old: npx npm-force-resolutions && pre-commit install -t pre-commit -t pre-push

scriptsComments.stest: use jest for testing, for a single test use '-- roll.test.js' for example
scriptsComments.dockertest: run tests inside docker container -->  --progress plain
scriptsComments.preinstall: insure that pre-commit hooks are installed
scriptsComments.preinstall:old: this runs automatically on install to enforce versions of dependencies, see 'resolutions' below

author: Jay <jay@karma.net> (https://karma.net/)
